name: fae makeup - Fairy Makeover & Wax Spa Salon - Dress up your Magical Fairy Princess in her Palace for All Sweet Fashion Girls
name_original: fae makeup - Fairy Makeover & Wax Spa Salon - Dress up your Magical Fairy Princess in her Palace for All Sweet Fashion Girls
description:
Fae makeup is a game for all Girls who have grown up listening fairy tales stories.
And now specially for girls, games like fairy salon is being launched.
Enter the fairy salon and play with magical fairies.
Get beauty tips and entertain yourself.
Customize your fairy with all possible combination of fairy outfits and matching fashion jewellery.

Features:

=> Fix her eyebrow, pimples.
=> Use beauty tonics on fairies face to make her glow.
=> Experience fairy makeup, fairy dress up, fairy spa all in one.
=> Cute fae hairystyles, fairy wings, magics sticks to make her adorable.
